Package ib.grapher

Class Main

java.lang.Object
ib.grapher.Main
public class Main extends Object
The main class of the grapher, in charge of managing other windows.

    • WONG_COLORS

      public static final Color[] WONG_COLORS
      These are the colours that will be selected by default for the graph. They are specifically designed to be high contrast, including for colour-blind people. I don't expect that to be an issue with my client, but since I have to choose arbitrary colours anyways, I might as well choose the most accessible ones possible. Plus, I like the palette.

    • stringToByteArray

      public static Byte[] stringToByteArray(String s, int size)
      Converts a string to an array of bytes the desired size.
      Parameters:
      s - The string to convert.
      size - The size of the byte list. Should be a multiple of 2. If the string is too long, extra characters are dropped. If the string is too short, it is padded with zeroes.
      Returns:
      The byte array.

    • intToByteArray

      public static Byte[] intToByteArray(int i)
      Converts an integer into an array of four bytes.
      Parameters:
      i - The integer to convert.
      Returns:
      The byte array.
